scripts.install:backend: cd apps/backend && [ -f go.mod ] && go mod download || echo 'Backend not initialized'
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n admin,user,website,backend -c blue,green,yellow,magenta "bun run dev:admin" "bun run dev:user" "bun run dev:website" "bun run dev:backend"
scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:ui && bun run build:shared
scripts.build:apps: bun run build:admin && bun run build:user && bun run build:website && bun run build:docs && bun run build:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/.next packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist apps/backend/bin
scripts.clean:backend: cd apps/backend && go clean && rm -rf bin
scripts.backend:init: cd apps/backend && go mod init github.com/MagicEdgeNet/magicedge-portal
